page.title: 18Laurie Lee Interview (1)
page.content: In an interview with Laurie Lee on the evening of June 15th,he expressed his opinions about present day Slad. When asked about the architecture he said he adored the 17th century buildings and thought the Victorian houses were average.Although the pre and post War buildings did not fit in well,he felt,the more modern houses were a good match and blended in well with the original Slad Valley style. When Laurie Lee found out that the whole world was not like Slad,he realised Slad was of out-standing beauty and he feels it has still not been exploited to this day.Although he sometimes feels worried about future preservation,despite responsible land- owners,he would not like to live anywhere else but Slad.
